mapper.select: SELECT ATTENDED_NUM, GROUP_NUM, TO_CHAR(ATTENDED_IN,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ATTENDED_IN, TO_CHAR(ATTENDED_OUT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ATTENDED_OUT, ATTENDED_TYPE FROM ATTENDED WHERE GROUP_NUM = #{groupNum} AND MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail} AND TO_CHAR(ATTENDED_IN,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(#{srchDate},'YYYYMM')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDED (MEM_EMAIL, GROUP_NUM, ATTENDED_IN, ATTENDED_OUT, ATTENDED_TYPE) VALUES (#{memEmail}, #{groupNum}, sysdate, null, 'F')
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDED SET ATTENDED_OUT=SYSDATE WHERE ATTENDED_NUM = ( SELECT MAX(ATTENDED_NUM) FROM ATTENDED WHERE GROUP_NUM = #{groupNum} AND MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail} AND TO_CHAR(ATTENDED_IN,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') )
